title: Victory Melbourne Cup
creator_contributor_role: Netherlands Indies Government Information Service, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Australia
abstract: 1945 Melbourne Cup and the winner is Rainbird!
description: An early kodachrome film made about the 1945 Melbourne Cup and the crew from the warship KG5, who arrive in Melbourne for the big race. General Sir Thomas Blamey (Commander in Chief Allied Land Forces) is also in attendance. The race was transmitted on Radio 3AW and won by Rainbird. Trainer was S Evans, ridden by W Cook. Odds for Rainbird were 12/1 and winning time was 3 mins 24 seconds.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002017; Melbourne Cup: Early Highlights; Active; 2011
